events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department focused on software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will be in touch soon.
We conducted an initial screening of your resume and would like to invite you to proceed to the next stage.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10:00 AM UTC with our senior software engineer.
You successfully completed the technical interview with strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency demonstrated.
Following your technical interview, we have scheduled an HR interview to discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your fit within the company environment.
We are excited to propose you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our development team.
You officially accepted the offer, and we have begun the onboarding process to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including equipment allocation and orientation sessions scheduled for new hires.
The recruitment process is now complete, and you have officially joined our engineering team. Welcome aboard!
